title: CSDGM basic
description: Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata Basic Standard

record.title: Metadata
record.tip: Information about the metadata for the resource.

record.title: Keywords
record.tip: Terms used to describe the resource.

record.title: Extent
record.tip: Information describing the bounds of the resource.

record.title: Spatial
record.tip: Information concerning the spatial attributes of the resource.

record.title: Lineage
record.tip: Information on the history of the resource.

record.title: Taxonomy
record.tip: Information on the taxa associated with the resource.

record.title: Constraints
record.tip: Information about constraints applied to the resource.

record.title: Associated
record.tip: Other resources with a defined relationship to the resource.

record.title: Documents
record.tip: Other documents related to, but not defining, the resource.

record.title: Funding
record.tip: Information about funding allocated to development of the resource.

record.title: Dictionaries
record.tip: Data dictionaries associated with the resource.

dictionary.title: Entities
dictionary.tip: Information about entities(tables) and attributes(columns or fields).
